run "clone curl repo.bat" to clone the repo source and copy the include dir.
for x64 builds open a Visual Studio x64 native tools command prompt and run build_x64.bat.
for x86 builds open a Visual Studio x86 native tools command prompt and run build_x86.bat.
Note: you may need to modify the vc17 setting in the build scripts if the version of Visual Studio you are running is not VS2022.

optionally run "delete curl directory.bat" remove the repo and build output files.
